Main Course.name: Lazooni Hung LiBa
Main Course.description: Garlic & red chili marinated cottage cheese chunks tossed with red chili sauce, oriental spices & vegetables, served with garlic fried rice

Main Course.name: Bon Robb
Main Course.description: Honey-glazed chicken tossed with chef’s special chili garlic sauce served with garlic fried rice

Risotto.name: Risotto ai Funghi – Add Chicken
Risotto.description: Creamy mushroom risotto finished with cheese and truffle oil (Optional Chicken)

Risotto.name: Seafood Red Hot Risotto
Risotto.description: Fiery seafood risotto with prawns, fish and calamari in a red chili sauce base

Pastas.name: Three Cheese Mac and Cheese
Pastas.description: Classic mac and cheese loaded with cheddar, mozzarella & parmesan

Pastas.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio – Veg/Chicken
Pastas.description: Garlic tossed spaghetti with olive oil, chili flakes, and optional chicken

Pastas.name: Penne Basil Pesto – Veg/Chicken
Pastas.description: Creamy pesto pasta with basil, pine nuts & choice of veggies or chicken

Pastas.name: Tagliatelle Alfredo – Veg/Chicken
Pastas.description: Classic white sauce pasta with fettuccine, parmesan & cream, optionally with chicken

Pastas.name: Pasta Arrabbiata – Veg/Chicken – Penne/Spaghetti
Pastas.description: Spicy tomato sauce pasta with your choice of penne or spaghetti, and optional chicken
